column4: does anybody have any idea how to help me fix ubuntu software center?
it shows the isntall button but when i press install nothing at all happens. normally it asks for my password.
are you able to install from terminal?  "sudo apt-get install foo" is the problem ONLY with software center?
ive never tried to install from terminal i didnt know the command
this is what i get when i do that command "Reading package lists... Done
replace "foo" with the program name you actually want to install
what are you trying to install?
i was trying to install java for minecraft and adobe flash
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras type thing
its installing, does that mean its a error with the software centre?
probably.  sorry i have no ideas on fixing software center.  good luck.
well since its a problem with that, how do i find the package name to do this for all the packages i want?
you can use "apt-cache search foo" to search on command line
I have no idea?  sorry.  try "sudo apt-get -f install" in a terminal perhaps.
